+ Menu Tabs

++ Toggle Ed./Prev. - [Ctrl-Shift-Space]
Switch between [Edit mode] and [Preview mode] in current WikiTextEditorTab.

++ Enter [Edit mode] - [Ctrl-Shift-A]
Show current WikiTextEditorTab in [Edit mode].

++ Enter [Preview mode] - [Ctrl-Shift-S]
Show current WikiTextEditorTab in [Preview mode].

----
 
++ Show Folding
Show/hide an additional margin to control folding on the left side of the WikiTextEditor. See [Folding].

++ Toggle Current Folding
Fold/Unfold at the current line. See [Folding].

++ Unfold All
Unfold all lines.

++ Fold All
Fold all lines.
